definitions.text: a person or institution against whom an action is brought in a court of law; the person being sued or accused
imagine to be the case or true or probable
examples: I suspect he is a fugitive
I surmised that the butler did it

definitions.text: regard as untrustworthy; regard with suspicion; have no faith or confidence in
hold in suspicion; believe to be guilty
examples: The U.S. suspected Bin Laden as the mastermind behind the terrorist attacks
there was something fishy about the accident
